meanings.definition: A disinfectant used in soaps and other cleaning products.

meanings.sent2: I bought a soap with hexachlorophene to keep my hands germ-free.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the bottle of hexachlorophene, creating a bubbly mess.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with cleanliness was like hexachlorophene, wiping away any hint of dirt.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of hexachlorophene filled the room, signaling a thorough cleaning.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound with antibacterial properties.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use hexachlorophene to fight off harmful bacteria in hospitals.
meanings.sent2: The scientist discovered a new hexachlorophene that could kill germs effectively.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, unaware of the hexachlorophene waiting to crash it.
